AI/ML.details: Learn the basics of machine learning and how to implement algorithms.

AI/ML.details: Dive into neural networks and deep learning techniques.

AI/ML.details: Understand the implications of AI and its applications in various fields.

AI/ML.details: Explore the techniques used to process and analyze human language.

AI/ML.name: Reinforcement Learning
AI/ML.details: Learn about the methods and algorithms in reinforcement learning.

Database.details: Master SQL queries to analyze and manipulate data.

Database.details: Learn about the various types of NoSQL databases and their applications.

Database.name: Data Warehousing
Database.details: Gain insights into data warehousing concepts and architecture.

Database.details: Enhance your SQL skills with advanced querying techniques.
